name: @test/ui-components

scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('Vite dev server running on http://localhost:5173'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"
scripts.test:watch: node -e "console.log('Running component tests in watch mode...'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"

description: UI component library for the test monorepo
